DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to assess what is the better neoadjuvant chemotherapy regimen for patients with initially unresectable locally advanced gastric cancer.
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison of XELOX Regimen and EOX Regimen as Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy Regimen for Locally Advanced Gastric Cancer.
DOC.criteria: more than 2 regional bulky lymph nodes macroscopic tumor type is either the Borrmann type 4 or large type 3 tumor invades adjacent structures (T4b) peritoneal metastasis confirmed by CT scan lung metastasis, liver metastasis, pleural effusion, and/or other distant metastasis
